com.github.rjbx.rateraid

Class Rateraid

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.rjbx.rateraid.Rateraid

  • public class Rateraid
extends java.lang.Object
    Classes for specifying adjustments to the values of, as well as behaviors for the views affecting, a percent series. Users can bind predefined as well as custom behaviors to their adjusting views to increment and decrement, as well as optionally remove or text edit the values of a percent series. The values remain synchronized throughout adjustments to the extent of the user-defined precision which articulates the acceptable Calibrater response.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • with

        public static Rateraid.PercentSeries with(double[] percents,
                                          double magnitude,
                                          int precision,
                                          android.view.View.OnClickListener clickListener)
        Initialize the double array percent series, attributes and behavior associated with all view binding method calls.
        Parameters:
        percents - double array elements
        magnitude - amount of the adjustment; non-zero value should be between 1 and -1
        precision - number of decimal places to move the permitted error from the whole
        clickListener - behavior to be applied on click of relevant views
        Returns:
        Rateraid.PercentSeries from which to chain view binding method calls

      • with

        public static <T extends Rateraid.Rateable> Rateraid.RateableSeries with(java.util.List<T> objects,
                                                                         double magnitude,
                                                                         int precision,
                                                                         android.view.View.OnClickListener clickListener)
        Initialize the Rateraid.Rateable ArrayList percent series, attributes and behavior associated with all view binding method calls.
        Parameters:
        objects - Rateraid.Rateable ArrayList elements
        magnitude - amount of the adjustment; non-zero value should be between 1 and -1
        precision - number of decimal places to move the permitted error from the whole
        clickListener - behavior to be applied on click of relevant views
        Returns:
        Rateraid.RateableSeries from which to chain view binding method calls

      • shiftRatings

        public static <T extends Rateraid.Rateable> boolean shiftRatings(java.util.List<T> objects,
                                                                 int index,
                                                                 double magnitude,
                                                                 int precision)
        Increments or decrements a Rateraid.Rateable ArrayList element by the specified magnitude while calibrating other Rateraid.Rateable ArrayList elements to maintain proportionality.
        Parameters:
        objects - Rateraid.Rateable ArrayList elements to be adjusted if not proportionate
        index - index of the array element to be adjusted
        magnitude - amount of the adjustment; non-zero value should be no more than 1 or -1
        precision - number of decimal places to move the allowed error from the whole
        Returns:
        true if percent was adjusted and false otherwise

      • resetRatings

        public static <T extends Rateraid.Rateable> boolean resetRatings(java.util.List<T> objects,
                                                                 boolean forceReset,
                                                                 java.lang.Integer precision)
        Assigns equivalent percents to each Rateraid.Rateable ArrayList element.
        Parameters:
        objects - Rateraid.Rateable ArrayList elements to be reset if not equivalent
        forceReset - applies reset even if sum of array elements is as precise as specified
        precision - number of decimal places to move the permitted error from the whole
        Returns:
        true if values were adjusted; false otherwise

      • removeRating

        public static <T extends Rateraid.Rateable> boolean removeRating(java.util.List<T> objects,
                                                                 int index)
        Removes Rateraid.Rateable from ArrayList at the specified index. The whole is then distributed among the remaining elements according to recalibrateRatings(List, boolean, Integer)
        Parameters:
        objects - Rateraid.Rateable ArrayList elements to be calibrated if not proportionate
        index - to be removed
        Returns:
        true if values were adjusted; false otherwise

      • recalibrateRatings

        public static <T extends Rateraid.Rateable> boolean recalibrateRatings(java.util.List<T> objects,
                                                                       boolean forceReset,
                                                                       java.lang.Integer precision)
        Reads Rateraid.Rateable ArrayList and equally distributes to each array element the difference between the whole and the sum of all array elements.
        Parameters:
        objects - Rateraid.Rateable ArrayList to be calibrated closer to the whole
        forceReset - applies reset even if sum of array elements is as precise as specified
        precision - number of decimal places to move the permitted error from the whole
        Returns:
        true if values were adjusted; false otherwise
